name: Pyro DMG Bonus
description: Increases the Pyro DMG your Characters and Summons deal this Round. (Excluding Swirl DMG)

descriptionreplaced: Increases the <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color></color> your Characters and Summons deal this Round. (Excluding Swirl DMG)
